speechless.
64% attack speed, roughly as much ad as a top tier ad item, roughly as much ap as some ap items, and an additional ap and ad ratio on all basic attacks.

...........So you accurately identify the item that is overpowered and then blame the champion?  

Jax *might* be too strong.  But right now, its rageblade that needs nerfs.  There are a large number of champions that just do far too well with this item.  I had a teemo one game vs a kassadin.  Teemo was 0/3 and half the cs of the kassadin, got rageblade, and instantly turned the lane and started dominating.  I'm sure everyone has stories like this involving gunblade.  

For now, gunblade is the problem and needs nerfs; not necessarily any champion.

The champion is a problem if they cant make changes without blowing the game up. 

Jax cant be balanced. 

Sustained dmg + innate survivability = Juggernaut (according to riot)

Juggernaut + long range gapcloser with 3 sec cooldown= broken (according to riot)

Broken + bursty + hybrid dmg + takes towers faster than jinx + fast as fuck + jumps to wards like lee sin = Jax (according to what he does)

Hes broken for so many reasons and is really not worth having around if hes going to look like this even once and a while.

It's not Jax, it's Rageblade... Rageblade is broken as heck. The last time we asked them to buff Rageblade or make my hybrid items, they complained saying Hybrid champions are too hard to balance since they'd have to balance them around the items so they'd be worthless until the item, then have a HUGE power spike when they finished that hybrid item for a snowbally mid game just to fall off late because Hybrid damage doesn't have any penetration...

Then they go and buff Guinsoos and return AP Yi to us when we don't want him to EVER come back on top of breaking Irelia and Jax. Squishy killers already kill squishies and Rageblade being a Hybrid item means it's a squishy killer item since squishies won't have enough armor AND magic resist to beat it.

You'd have thought they'd learn from Akali who has one of the biggest power spikes in the game off of a Gunblade, the hybrid item they've balanced her off of for ever.
